lead_paragraph: LESSER--Lola, of New York City died on October 26, 2014. Born July 28, 1927 in Berlin Germany, Lola is survived by her three children: Jacquie Herz of Stamford, CT; Shoshana Angyalfi of Leeds, England; Roger Lewin of Ft. Lauderdale, FL. She was the adored Nana to eight grandchildren: Jordie, Nikki, Chani, Yossi, Mendy, Rivki, Chaya, Moshe and a loving GG to 24 great-grandchildren. A very beautiful woman, both inside and out, Lola touched the hearts of everyone she knew. She will be truly missed by family and friends alike.
